de.tif.jacob.scheduler.ScheduleIterator

Uses of ScheduleIterator in de.tif.jacob.scheduler
 

Methods in de.tif.jacob.scheduler that return ScheduleIterator
abstract  ScheduleIterator SchedulerTask.iterator()
           
 

Uses of ScheduleIterator in de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators
 

Classes in de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators that implement ScheduleIterator
 class CompositeIterator
          A CompositeIterator combines a number of ScheduleIterators into a single ScheduleIterator.
 class CronIterator
          Implementation of a schedule iterator which is based on cron entry.
 class DailyIterator
          A DailyIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day.
 class MinutesIterator
          A MinutesIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day.
 class OffsetIterator
          An OffsetIterator modifies the dates returned by a ScheduleIterator by a constant calendar offset.
 class RestrictedDailyIterator
          A RestrictedDailyIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days (restricted to a set of days, e.g. weekdays only) representing the same time each day.
 class SecondsIterator
          A SecondsIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day.
 class WeeklyIterator
          A WeeklyIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day of week.
 

Constructors in de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators with parameters of type ScheduleIterator
CompositeIterator(ScheduleIterator[] scheduleIterators)
           
OffsetIterator(ScheduleIterator scheduleIterator, int field, int offset)
